title: League friends app. Question about the last activity.
body:
So when in game it shows "Last activity 20 mins" or something, and on the app it says "Summoner name Mobile - 20m" 

What does the last activity mean? It's not when they were last in game cause this person has been off for a while, but is it like when they last sent a message using the app or something? Really curious about this.

replies.body: Other people as well. It's a "last time online" indicator for all intents and purposes.  :)
It's when they last interacted with the client or app. "Interacted" meaning like sending a message, playing a game, etc.  :)

Thanks!!!

Also, does this mean just sent a message to me? Or other people as well?
